attributes.action: Full Independence for South West England
attributes.additional_details: End of being subserviant to london and the poverty we face to overspending within that region and not in ours. end to being governed by people on the other side of the country and from people who do not care about our region. we are culturally different to the rest of the uk. i want full independence for the south west including gloucestershire, somerset, devon, cornwall and the isles of scilly. we will remain a constitutional monarchy under the house of windsor but will have our own government. self determination is the basic right of any people in any region across the globe. this government has stated that numerous times.
